Lore: ISB \b leader\b0.
Gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. When deployed, may reveal the top two cards of your Reserve Deck; take one into hand and place the other in Used Pile. While with an ISB agent, adds one battle destiny.
Information: Original card: Imperial Trooper Guard

Characteristics: \b Duros\b0, \b Black Sun agent\b0 ,\b information broker\b0, \b scout\b0, \b smuggler\b0, female
Lore: Duros \b information broker\b0, \b scout\b0, and \b smuggler \b0.
Gametext: Adds 3 to power of anything she pilots. Adds 1 to hyperspeed of anything she pilots. Once per turn, if you just deployed a Black Sun Agent to same system, may draw top card of Reserve Deck. Your characters here are immune to Cantina Brawl and Fallen Portal.
Information: Orignal card: Baniss Keeg

Characteristics: \b Duros\b0, \b Black Sun agent\b0, \b bounty hunter\b0
Lore: Duros \b bounty hunter\b0.
Gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. Your other bounty hunters here are power +1. Draws one battle destiny if unable to otherwise. During battle, if with your other bounty hunter, may cancel the immunity to attrition of a Jedi here.
Information: Original card: Yuzzum\par \par Original concept by Brad Eier

Lore: Logistics officer for the \ul Avenger\ul0, member of the Line Branch of the Imperial Navy. Relays important scanner information to Captain Needa. Fiercely competitive.
Gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. Once per game, may deploy from Reserve Deck (reshuffle) an \ul Imperial\ul0-class Star Destroyer. While piloting \ul Avenger\ul0, it is immune to attrition < 4 and during battle may lose an Imperial aboard (or from hand) to cancel a just drawn destiny (causes a redraw if opponent's first battle destiny).
Information: Original concept by UK Community\par ---------- \par Imperial-class Star Destroyers are: \par Accuser\par Avenger\par Chimaera\par Conquest\par Conquest (V)\par Death Squadron Star Destroyer\par Devastator\par Judicator\par Imperial-Class Star Destroyer\par Stalker\par Stalker (V)\par Thunderflare\par Tyrant\par Vengeance\par Vengeance (V)\par Visage
Pulls: Accuser\par Avenger\par Chimaera\par Conquest\par Conquest (V)\par Death Squadron Star Destroyer\par Devastator\par Imperial-Class Star Destroyer\par Judicator\par Stalker\par Stalker (V)\par Thunderflare\par Tyrant\par Vengeance\par Vengeance (V)\par Visage

Lore: Trade Federation.
Gametext: \ul If drawn for destiny, may take into hand to cancel and redraw that destiny.\ul0  Cancels Blaster Deflection (and Amidala's game text) here. Maul's weapon destiny draws may not be modified or canceled by opponent. Immune to attrition < 5.
Information: Original card: If The Trace Was Correct\par \par Original concept by Brad Eier\par \par Re-released in Virtual Set 12 "Tweak Set". Original text: \par Cancels the game text of Amidala, Obi-Wan, and Qui-Gon at same site. While alone, Blaster Deflection is canceled here and Maul's weapon destiny draws may not be modified or canceled by opponent. Immune to attrition < 5.\par Deploy 7\par -----------------\par \par Darth Maul, Lone Hunter deploys free at Tatooine: Desert Landing Site.\par -----\par Darth Maul personas are:\par \par Darth Maul\par Darth Maul With Lightsaber\par Darth Maul, Lone Hunter\par Darth Maul, Young Apprentice\par Lord Maul\par Lord Maul With Lightsaber
Combo: Darth Maul, Lone Hunter + Maul Strikes\par -----\par Darth Maul, Lone Hunter + The Phantom Menace\par While present with an opponent's Jedi, Maul is defense value +2 and immune to attrition.\par -----\par Darth Maul, Lone Hunter + I Have You Now\par Add one battle destiny (two if Rebel is Luke) if a Dark Jedi and a Rebel with ability > 2 are involved in the same battle.\par -----\par Darth Maul, Lone Hunter + Force Field\par Cancels an attempt to target a Dark Jedi with a character weapon.

Lore: Trade Federation.
Gametext: Any stolen lightsaber may deploy on Grievous. Once per game, Grievous may steal a lightsaber from opponent's Lost Pile. Unless alone, may lose 1 Force to return Grievous (and your cards on him) to hand from a site you control. Immune to attrition < 4.
Information: This card has a Separatist icon.\par \par Original card: Raithal Operative\par \par Original concept by Jeremy Gardner
Pulls: Steals one lightsaber from opponent's Lost Pile

Lore: Gamorrean in charge of the Gamorreans at Jabba's palace. Posted to stand guard at the entrance cavern. Assigned by Jabba to keep an eye on Tessek.
Gametext: While at a Jabba's Palace site, your other Gamorreans are deploy -1 and forfeit +3.  Permanent weapon is (*]Ortugg's Ax (may target a character or creature for free; draw destiny; target hit, and its forfeit = 0, if destiny +1 > defense value).
Information: Original concept by Phillip Gladney

Lore: Located atop the superstructure of a Star Destroyer, the generator towers create an energy shield which repels solid objects and weapons fire.
Gametext: Deploy on a capital starship. Starship is power and armor +2 and immune to attrition < 5. May cancel Combined Attack or Power Pivot targeting this starship. Starfighters here may not 'attach'.

Lore: Anakin had to heed Qui-Gon's advice to avoid the rapidly approaching storm.
Gametext: Deploy on table. While no card stacked here, may stack opponent's just-played Interrupt here. Opponent may use 3 Force to place an Interrupt here in Used Pile. Once per turn, may place a card from hand on bottom of Used Pile.  (Immune to Alter.)
Information: Original concept by Matthew Carulli.
IsPulled: Twi'lek Advisor\par We Must Accelerate Our Plans

Gametext: While you occupy with a Black Sun agent or ISB agent, gains one [Dark Side Force icon] icon and one [Light Side Force icon] icon.    While you control, gains one [Light Side Force icon] icon.
LightSideText: While you control, gains one [Light Side Force icon] icon.
DarkSideText: While you occupy with a Black Sun agent or ISB agent, gains one [Dark Side Force icon] icon and one [Light Side Force icon] icon.
Information: Original card: Coruscant (Dark) (Special Edition)

Gametext: Unless Chewie, Dash, or Leia present, Force drain -1 here.   Black Sun agents move to here for free. Once per turn, may deploy from Reserve Deck (reshuffle) a Xizor's Palace site.
LightSideText: Unless Chewie, Dash, or Leia present, Force drain -1 here.
DarkSideText: Black Sun agents move to here for free. Once per turn, may deploy from Reserve Deck (reshuffle) a Xizor's Palace site.
Information: Original Card: Clour City: Chasm Walkway (Dark)
Pulls: Xizor's Palace: Sewer\par Xizor's Palace: Uplink Station

Gametext: If \ul Falleen's Fist\ul0 at Coruscant and your Black Sun agent here, Force drain +1 here.
DarkSideText: If \ul Falleen's Fist\ul0 at Coruscant and your Black Sun agent here, Force drain +1 here.
Information: Original card: Yavin IV: Docking Bay (Dark)
IsPulled: Coruscant: Xizor's Palace\par Neimoidian Advisor\par Vigo (V)

Gametext: If a player controls, for each of their starships here, their power is +1 in battles at Tatooine sites.   Opponent may not initiate battle here until after your first turn.
LightSideText: If a player controls, for each of their starships here, their power is +1 in battles at Tatooine sites.
DarkSideText: Opponent may not initiate battle here until after your first turn.

Gametext: Deploys -3 if your Black Sun agent is at a related site. May add 3 pilots and 6 passengers. Permanent pilots provide total ability of 4. Immune to attrition < 8.
Information: Original card: Sentinel-Class Landing Craft

Lore: Mon Calamari \b leader\b0  of Rebel fleet. Master military strategist. Early prisoner of Grand Moff Tarkin. Convinced his people to join the Alliance.
Gametext: Adds 3 to power of any capital starship he pilots. Deploys free aboard \ul Home One\ul0 . While piloting a Star Cruiser, adds one battle destiny.  Where you have two Rebel capital starships, attrition against opponent is +2.
IsPulled: Balanced Attack\par Rebel Leadership (V)\par Yavin 4: Massassi War Room (V)
Combo: Admiral Ackbar (V) + Rebel Leadership (V)\par Add one battle destiny or prevent opponent from drawing more than one battle destiny at same system.

Lore: Alderaanian \b leader\b0.
Gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots (3 if any Rebel capital starship). Deploys -1 aboard \ul Tantive IV\ul0 . While aboard \ul Tantive IV\ul0 , it is immune to Lateral Damage and attrition < 5.
Information: Original card: Warrior's Courage\par \par Errata June 30, 2016. Previous lore:\par Leader.
IsPulled: Antilles Maneuver (V)\par Yavin 4: Massassi War Room (V)

Lore: Clone trooper and \b spy\b0.
Gametext: Once per turn, if you just drew a destiny of 5, may take that card into hand. During any deploy phase, may use 1 Force to target a Dark Jedi present. Draw destiny. If destiny = 5, target loses immunity to attrition for remainder of turn.
Information: This card has a Clone Army icon.\par\par Original card: Cloud City Technician\par \par Original concept by Chris Menzel

Lore: Duros \b scout\b0  and \b smuggler\b0 .
Gametext: Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots. Adds 2 to hyperspeed of any freighter he pilots. During your move phase, may use 1 Force to "break cover" of opponent's Undercover spy at same site. Cancels Lateral Damage targeting your starship at same or related system.
Information: Original card: Ellorrs Madak\par \par Original concept by Brian Fred.
Combo: Ellorrs Madak, Pilot Instructor + Dash Rendar + Outrider: Make Outrider immune to Lateral Damage

Lore: General Solo's strike team was made up of the Alliance's finest ground troops. \b Scout\b0 troopers.
Gametext: Deploys -1 to Endor. During battle, your other Rebels present with Endor Commando Team may not have their forfeit reduced unless this card 'hit.' Each time this character is 'hit,' it is cumulatively power -2 until end of turn.
Information: Original Card: Rapid Deployment

Lore: Padawan.
Gametext: Adds 1 to power of anything he pilots. While present with an Imperial (or two Rebels), all immunity to attrition here is canceled.
Information: Original card: See-Threepio\par \par Original concept by Jarad Konsker.

Lore: Female Duros. Expert pilot. Helps run the docking facilities in Mos Eisley. Friends with Ellorrs Madak. Approves all cargo manifests. Forgiving of minor transgressions.
Gametext: Adds 3 to power of anything she pilots. Smuggler. Adds 1 to hyperspeed of any freighter she pilots. Your total ability at same docking bay or system may not be reduced. Once per game, may deploy from Reserve Deck (reshuffle) a card with "Ellorrs" in title here.
Pulls: Ellorrs Madak\par Ellorrs Madak, Pilot Instructor

Lore: Hero of Nentan. Supervised construction of Echo Base on Hoth. Head of base security. At the Mos Eisley Cantina, everyone knows his name.
Gametext: Scout. Deploys free to (and power +2 at) Cantina, Endor, or Hoth. Opponent may not 'react' to or from here. Once per game, may retrieve an Explosive Charge into hand.
Information: Original concept by Matt Thornton

Lore: \b Leader\b0 .
Gametext: Adds 2 to power of any capital starship he pilots. Your Rebel starships may move to here for free. While piloting a Rebel capital starship, opponent may not modify or cancel your battle destinies here.
Information: Original card: Loci Rosen\par --------\par Mon Calamari are:\par \par Admiral Ackbar\par Admiral Ackbar (V)\par Captain Verrack\par First Officer Thaneespi\par Loci Rosen\par Major Haash'n
IsPulled: Admiral Ackbar\par Balanced Attack\par Rebel Leadership (V)\par Yavin 4: Massassi War Room (V)

Lore: Queen Amidala posed as one of her own handmaidens for added safety as well as to keep an eye on her Jedi protectors. Was to be protected by the Jedi at all times.
Gametext: Cancels Vader's game text here. If with a Skywalker, may add one destiny to attrition. Immune to attrition < 3.
Information: Amidala personas are:\par \par Padme Naberrie\par Padme Naberrie (V)\par Queen Amidala\par Queen Amidala, Ruler Of Naboo

Lore: Stranded in the Dune Sea, R2-D2 insisted on heading into rocky canyons where he thought settlements were likely to exist. Threepio had other ideas.
Gametext: If about to leave table (even from Overwhelmed) from Tatooine system and Stolen Data Tapes deployed on this character, may instead be relocated to Dune Sea. Immune to A Gift, Firepower, devices, and opponent's Interrupts.
Information: Original card: How Did We Get Into This Mess?\par \par Errata April 20, 2016. Previous text:\par If about to leave table (even from Overwhelmed) from Tatooine system and Stolen Data Tapes deployed on this character, may instead be relocated to Dune Sea. Immune to devices. Unless Undercover, immune to opponent's Interrupts.\par --------\par R2-D2 personas are:\par \par Artoo\par Artoo & Threepio\par Artoo, Brave Little Droid\par [Artoo-Detoo In Red 5]\par R2-D2 (Artoo-Detoo)\par R2-D2 (Artoo-Detoo) (V)\par -----\par C-3PO personas are:\par \par Artoo & Threepio\par C-3PO (See-Threepio)\par See-Threepio\par Threepio\par Threepio With His Parts Showing
IsPulled: Artoo, Come Back At Once!\par Seeking An Audience\par Seeking An Audience (V)\par Were You Looking For Me?
Combo: R2-D2 & C-3PO + Chewie With Blaster Rifle\par Chewie With Blaster Rifle adds one battle destiny if with C-3PO.

Lore: Chief Controller at Echo Command. Responsible for communicating orders to the troops. Personally gives firing orders to Ion Cannon Control.
Gametext: Add 2 to power of anything she pilots. Your total battle destiny here is +1 (+2 if piloting a transport). Once per turn, if a battle just ended here, may 'rescue' (retrieve from Lost Pile OR stack on [Set 0] Evacuation Control) a Rebel of ability < 3 forfeited from same location this turn.
Information: Original concept by Camden Yanaga\par \par Errata December 2017. Original text: \par Adds 2 to power of anything she pilots. Your total battle destiny here is +1 (+2 if piloting a transport). Once per turn, if a battle just ended, may 'rescue' (retrieve from Lost Pile OR stack on [Set 0] Evacuation Control) a Rebel of ability < 3 forfeited from same location this turn.

Lore: Key installations are protected from bombardment by a complex network of early warning sensors, emergency shields and fast response fighters.
Gametext: Plays on any site. This location may not be targeted by Proton Bombs. Cancels Program Trap here. Unless Death Star: Docking Bay 327 on table, Commence Primary Ignition is canceled.
Information: Errata October 2018. Original text: \par Plays on any site. This location may not be targeted by Proton Bombs. Unless Death Star: Docking Bay 327 on table, Commence Primary Ignition is canceled.

Lore: "What's so important? What's he carrying?" "The technical readouts of that battle station. I only hope that when the data is analyzed, a weakness can be found."
Gametext: Deploy on R2-D2. If about to leave table (even from Overwhelmed), relocate to Dune Sea (if possible). If at Dune Sea, may relocate to your character there. If at Alderaan (or a 'blown away' system), tapes 'delivered;' relocate this Effect to table and may take into hand from Reserve Deck (reshuffle) any card. (Immune to Alter.)
Information: Original card: Death Star Plans
IsPulled: The Signal\par We Wish To Board At Once\par Wokling (V)

Lore: Lando's confidence in the Rebel strike team on the forest moon was rewarded, and proved to be a decisive factor at the Battle of Endor.
Gametext: Deploy on table. Your scouts move for free to and from Back Door when using their landspeed. Once per turn, may deploy from Reserve Deck (reshuffle) an Endor battleground site. While an Explosive Charge at Bunker, flip Rebel Strike Team and Garrison Destroyed may not flip. (Immune to Alter.)
Information: Startable with Heading For The Medical Frigate.
Pulls: Endor: Back Door\par Endor: Bunker (V)\par Endor: Dense Forest\par Endor: Ewok Village\par Endor: Ewok Village (V)\par Endor: Great Forest\par Endor: Hidden Forest Trail\par Endor: Landing Platform (Docking Bay)\par Endor: Rebel Landing Site (Forest)
IsPulled: General Solo (V)\par The Signal\par We Wish To Board At Once

Lore: Being sent to dispose of two Jedi is the battle droid equivalent of a really bad day at the office.
Gametext: Deploy on table. While no card stacked here, may stack opponent's just-played Interrupt here. Opponent may use 3 Force to place an Interrupt here in Used Pile. Once per turn, may place a card from hand on bottom of Used Pile. (Immune to Alter.)
Information: Original concept by Matthew Carulli
IsPulled: The Signal\par We Wish To Board At Once

Lore: In times of greatest need, the Rebellion relies on the brilliant leadership provided by commanders fighting for freedom.
Gametext: Take into hand from Reserve Deck (reshuffle) an admiral or general. OR If your admiral is in battle at a system (or your general is in battle at a site), you may either add one battle destiny or prevent opponent from drawing more than one battle destiny.
Information: Original concept by Brad Eier
Pulls: Admiral Ackbar\par Admiral Ackbar (V)\par Admiral U.O. Statura\par General Airen Cracken\par General Calrissian\par General Carlist Rieekan\par General Carlist Rieekan (V)\par General Crix Madine\par General Dodonna\par General Dodonna (V)\par General Jar Jar\par General Kenobi\par General Leia Organa\par General McQuarrie\par General Solo\par General Solo (V)\par General Walex Blissex\par General Walex Blissex (V)\par Gungan General\par Mon Calamari Admiral\par Obi-Wan Kenobi\par Obi-Wan Kenobi (V)
Combo: General Solo (V) can play Rebel Leadership (V) from Reserve Deck during battle.

CardName: The Force Is Strong With This One (V)
Lore: Luke's piloting skills and Force abilities made his X-wing a difficult target for Darth Vader as they raced down the Death Star trench.
Gametext: If your Padawan or Skywalker is in battle with a Dark Jedi, either add one battle destiny or cancel I Have You Now. OR If Luke is in battle with an opponent's character of ability > 3, add one battle destiny.
Information: Re-released in Virtual Set 12 "Tweak Set". Original text: \par If your padawan or Skywalker of ability < 6 is in battle with a Dark Jedi, either add one battle destiny or cancel I Have You Now.

Lore: Modified medium transport. Well armored. Has expanded passenger capacity to facilitate evacuation. The last transport to escape Hoth. Nearly destroyed by the \ul Stalker\ul0.
Gametext: May add 2 pilots and 6 passengers. Permanent pilot provides ability of 2. If in battle with another Rebel capital starship, may draw destiny. Subtract that amount from opponent's attrition and total power.

May add 3 pilots and 6 passengers. Permanent pilot provides ability of 2. During battle, your total battle destiny is +1 for each smuggler aboard. Deploys and moves like a starfighter. Immune to attrition < 5.
Information: Original card: Medium Bulk Freighter\par \par Re-released in Virtual Set 12 "Tweak Set". Original text: \par Deploy 5

CardName: Diplomatic Mission To Alderaan/A Weakness Can Be Found
ObjectiveFront: \ul Deploy Tatooine system (with \ul0 Tantive IV\ul , non-[Reflections II] R2-D2, and Stolen Data Tapes there) and Dune Sea. \ul0 \par \b For\b0  remainder of game, you may not deploy Sandwhirl or [Episode I] Jedi.\par \b While\b0  this side up, your Force drains at Tatooine system are -1. Once per turn, may deploy from Reserve Deck (reshuffle) Alderaan or a Tatooine battleground site. Until the start of your first turn, \ul Tantive IV\ul0  may be forfeited to cancel all remaining battle damage.\par \b Flip\b0  this card if Stolen Data Tapes 'delivered' and Rebels control two battlegrounds (a site and a system).
ObjectiveBack: \b While\b0  this side up, your total battle destiny is +X, where X = number of battlegrounds occupied by Rebels of ability < 4. Once per turn, may deploy from Reserve Deck (reshuffle) Alderaan or a Tatooine battleground site. Once per turn, if you just won a battle, may retrieve 1 Force.\par \b Flip\b0  this card if you do not occupy a battleground site and a battleground system (or you do not control any locations).
Gametext: [Front Side]: \ul Deploy Tatooine system (with \ul0 Tantive IV\ul , non-[Reflections II] R2-D2, and Stolen Data Tapes there) and Dune Sea. \ul0 \par \b For\b0  remainder of game, you may not deploy Sandwhirl or [Episode I] Jedi.\par \b While\b0  this side up, your Force drains at Tatooine system are -1. Once per turn, may deploy from Reserve Deck (reshuffle) Alderaan or a Tatooine battleground site. Until the start of your first turn, \ul Tantive IV\ul0  may be forfeited to cancel all remaining battle damage.\par \b Flip\b0  this card if Stolen Data Tapes 'delivered' and Rebels control two battlegrounds (a site and a system). \par [Back Side]: \b While\b0  this side up, your total battle destiny is +X, where X = number of battlegrounds occupied by Rebels of ability < 4. Once per turn, may deploy from Reserve Deck (reshuffle) Alderaan or a Tatooine battleground site. Once per turn, if you just won a battle, may retrieve 1 Force.\par \b Flip\b0  this card if you do not occupy a battleground site and a battleground system (or you do not control any locations).
Information: Original cards: Our Most Desperate Hour/Attack Run (Rare2)\par \par Errata September 2017. Original text:\par [Front] Deploy Tatooine system (with Tantive IV, non-[Reflections II] R2-D2, and Stolen Data Tapes there) and Dune Sea. For remainder of game, you may not deploy Sandwhirl or [Episode 1] Jedi. While this side up, your Force drains at Tatooine system are -1. Once per turn, may deploy from Reserve Deck (reshuffle) Alderaan or a Tatooine battleground site. While with Devastator, Tantive IV may be forfeited to satisfy all battle damage against you. Flip this card if Stolen Data Tapes 'delivered' and Rebels control two battlegrounds (a site and a system). (Back unchanged)\par \par Errata July 2016. Original text:\par (Front unchanged) [Back] While this side up, your total battle destiny is +X, where X = number of battlegrounds occupied by Rebels of ability < 4. Once per turn, if you just won a battle, may retrieve 1 Force. Flip this card if you do not occupy a battleground site and a battleground system (or you do not control any locations).
